summary: A new AdminSettingsDialog component was added that reads/writes the Gemini API key to localStorage (key: "gemini_api_key") with a success toast. AdminDashboardPage was modified to import the dialog and add state for it, but the diff is truncated before any evidence of the required "⚙️ Settings" button and dialog trigger/rendering in the admin action area.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a new, visually distinct button labeled "⚙️ Settings" in the Admin Dashboard main action area with grey/black styling, and clicking it opens the Settings modal.
missing_requirements.reason: AdminDashboardPage shows new state/import for the settings dialog, but the diff excerpt does not include any UI code proving the presence of the "⚙️ Settings" button in the admin action grid/list, nor its grey/black styling, nor the click handler wiring.

missing_requirements.requirement: Settings modal opens when "⚙️ Settings" is clicked (modal trigger wiring in Admin Dashboard).
missing_requirements.reason: The modal component exists, but the AdminDashboardPage diff excerpt does not show that the dialog is rendered and controlled by the "⚙️ Settings" button click.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a "Cancel" button to the Settings modal dialog.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only specifies a password input and a "Save Settings" button; it does not request a cancel action.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added project tracking metadata files (project_state.json and frontend-file-summaries.txt).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not request changes to repository metadata/summary files; only the Admin Dashboard settings UI and localStorage behavior were requested.
